title: Rageblade Gunblade Kassawin is extremely broken

replies.body: I imagine if you let anyone get 6 items they are going to fuck you up.
the fact that you put sated in shows you don't know how kass works. All you do is pop in, one-shot the ADC and pop-out if you can.

That's nothing.  You haven't seen how broken Janna is yet.

{{champion:40}} + {{item:3124}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3004}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3139}} = WIN

> [{quoted}](name=Qsario,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aKvI2YIE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-08T02:09:26.137+0000)
>
> That's nothing.  You haven't seen how broken Janna is yet.
> 
> {{champion:40}} + {{item:3124}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3004}} {{item:3094}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3139}} = WIN

It's not as OP as kassawin, but still broken because of the free ad she gets from shield.
Do you intend to do this with every champion?

"he has burst/dps and is still impossible to catch/run from because of his mobility."

... You just described every kassadin ever...
well, every kassadin pre-nerf...his new kit is nothing until late game and even then it can only perform so well while having a horrible laning phase
Kassadin blows up instantly without zhonyas, staying in combat is the last thing you should do, so I don't why auto attacking with Kass should be seen as a good thing

> [{quoted}](name=LadyRenly,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aKvI2YIE,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-08T01:27:50.413+0000)
>
> Kassadin blows up instantly without zhonyas, staying in combat is the last thing you should do, so I don't why auto attacking with Kass should be seen as a good thing

He doesn't because of the massive heal the gunblade provides combined with RoA massive HP pool and his innate magic resist. Plus he can just blink in/instakill someone/blink out.

> [{quoted}](name=TeemoXNidalee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aKvI2YIE,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-12-08T01:33:43.520+0000)
>
> He doesn't because of the massive heal the gunblade provides combined with RoA massive HP pool and his innate magic resist. Plus he can just blink in/instakill someone/blink out.

15% heals on single targets and 5% heals on AoE.
"Massive heal" my ass. 
Kass doesnt have the ratios for what youre peddling; I could imagine it if you were full AP with gunblade as your last non-defensive item; but your shitty build has less than 250AP.

>"massive heal the gunblade provides"

Yeah, if your opponent is feeding/AFK that'd be a thing...that's like saying **Frozen Heart**'s 15% Attack Speed slow is a win condition against ADCs.
